title: How get a full memory dump of a running specific process from kernel mode by driver?
content: How can i get a full memory dump of a running specific process from kernel mode by driver on windows operation system?

comments.text: Is it a physical machine or a VM?
By memory dump I presume you mean the dump format understood by WinDbg and friends? This is a very intriguing question. Voting to reopen.
yes it is on physical machine !

take a look at mathieu suiches win32dd project he open sourced it 10 years and it has been discontinued and possibly commercialized versions have taken its place but you should be able to locate old srcs in wayback machine
